responses.hello: Hello! How can I assist you today?
responses.hi: Hi there! What can I do for you?
responses.how are you: I'm just a bot, but I'm doing great! How about you?
responses.what is your name: I'm a professional Python chatbot. You can call me ProBot!
responses.what can you do: I can chat with you, answer questions, and help you with various tasks!
responses.tell me a joke: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
responses.default: I'm sorry, I don't understand that. Can you rephrase or ask something else?
